publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2192 Ross Finnie: Special Grant Report (No.4) and Guidance for Local Authorities: The Domestic Water and Sewerage Charges (Reduction) (Scotland) Regulations 2001-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the Special Grant Report (No.4) and Guidance for Local Authorities: The Domestic Water and Sewerage Charges (Reduction) (Scotland) Regulations 2001 be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*
